  • Package Presentation.Views.Frames

    • Class Presentation.Views.Frames.GameView

      class GameView extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • backButton
          JButton backButton
          Necessary button to go back to the previous view
        • clickCoffeeButton
          JButton clickCoffeeButton
          Button activated everytime a coffee has been clicked.
        • coffeeCounter
          long coffeeCounter
          Variable that will store the number of coffees owned by the user.
        • coffeesPerSecond
          long coffeesPerSecond
          Variable that will store the number of coffees generated per second
        • coffeesPerSecondLabel
          JLabel coffeesPerSecondLabel
          Label to be updated repeatedly with the number of coffees generated per second.
        • coffeesPerSecondPanel
          JPanel coffeesPerSecondPanel
          Panel in which the label with the number of coffees per second is stored.
        • columnNames
          String[] columnNames
          Array of String that saves the titles to be shown on the table of generators.
        • endGameButton
          JButton endGameButton
          Necessary button to finalise the game.
        • generators
          ArrayList<Generator> generators
          List of the total generators of the game.
        • generatorsPanel
          JPanel generatorsPanel
          General panel containing the different panels of the generator views.
        • generatorsViews
          ArrayList<JPanel> generatorsViews
          List of the panels containing the generator views.
        • listener
          ActionListener listener
          Necessary listener for the buttons of the view.
        • numberCoffeesLabel
          JLabel numberCoffeesLabel
          Label to be updated repeatedly with the number of coffees owned by the user.
        • numberCoffeesPanel
          JPanel numberCoffeesPanel
          Panel in which the label with the number of coffees is stored.
        • powerUps
          ArrayList<PowerUp> powerUps
          List of the total power ups of the game.
        • powerUpsPanel
          JPanel powerUpsPanel
          General panel containing the different panels of the power up views.
        • powerUpViews
          ArrayList<JPanel> powerUpViews
          List of the panels containing the power up views.
        • productionData
          ArrayList<String[]> productionData
          Arraylist of arrays of Strings that handles the updated information of the generators.
        • profileButton
          JButton profileButton
          Necessary button to go to the user's profile.
        • tableData
          DefaultTableModel tableData
          Necessary for the creation of the table of generators.

      class StatisticsView extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

          ArrayList<Game> allGames
          List with all the games from user registered.

          JButton backButton
          Necessary button to get to the previous view.
        • gamesComboBox
          JComboBox<String> gamesComboBox
          Information related to the games of a specific user.
        • generateGraphButton
          JButton generateGraphButton
          Necessary button to generate the graphic of a specific user's game.
        • graphPanel
          JPanel graphPanel
          Panel necessary to contain the graphic.
        • numCoffee
          ArrayList<Long> numCoffee
          List with the different number coffees the user owned at the specific times saved in theTime list.
        • selectedGame
          String selectedGame
          String necessary to store the selected game.
        • selectedUser
          String selectedUser
          String necessary to store the selected user.
        • time
          ArrayList<Integer> time
          List with the different times in which the information has been updated, every 1 minute.
        • userButton
          JButton userButton
          Necessary button to get to the user's view.
        • userNames
          ArrayList<String> userNames
          List with the users registered.
        • usersComboBox
          JComboBox<String> usersComboBox
          Information related to all the users who have registered.
